signals.problem_statement: The customer needs their executive assistant to access and manage emails without cluttering the main inbox.
signals.suggested_solution: Implement a tagging and auto-closing system for newsletters and other non-urgent emails.
signals.context: 10 people on the team, using three shared inboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the cost of upgrading their plan, which doubles the monthly fee.
signals.context: Currently at the limit of users and mailboxes on the growth plan.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to automate the tracking of email activity by team members for performance metrics.
signals.suggested_solution: Automate data exports to Google Sheets for weekly scorecards.
signals.context: Looking to compile email activity data for performance tracking.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a way to filter out duplicate late payment notices from vendors to avoid clutter.
signals.context: Managing multiple emails regarding late payments from various clients.
